verses.verse: The man<WH120> knew<WH3045> Eve<WH2332> his wife.<WH802> She conceived,<WH2029> and gave birth<WH3205> to Cain,<WH7014> and said,<WH559> "I have gotten<WH7069> a man<WH376> with<WH854> Yahweh<WH3068>'s help."
Again<WH3254> she gave birth,<WH3205> to Cain<WH251>'s brother Abel.<WH1893> Abel<WH1893> was a keeper<WH7462> of sheep,<WH6629> but Cain<WH7014> was a tiller<WH5647> of the ground.<WH127>
As time<WH3117> passed,<WH7093> it happened that Cain<WH7014> brought<WH935> an offering<WH4503> to Yahweh<WH3068> from the fruit<WH6529> of the ground.<WH127>
Abel<WH1893> also brought<WH935> some of the firstborn<WH1062> of his flock<WH6629> and of its fat.<WH2459> Yahweh<WH3068> respected<WH8159> Abel<WH1893> and his offering,<WH4503>
but he didn't<WH7014> respect Cain and his offering.<WH4503> Cain<WH7014> was very<WH3966> angry,<WH2734> and the expression on his face<WH6440> fell.<WH5307>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Cain,<WH7014> "Why are you angry?<WH2734> Why has the expression of your face<WH6440> fallen?<WH5307>

If<WH518> you do well,<WH3190> will it not be lifted<WH7613> up?<WH3190> If you don't do well, sin<WH2403> crouches<WH7257> at the door.<WH6607> Its desire<WH8669> is for you,<WH4910> but you are to rule over it."

Cain<WH7014> said<WH559> to<WH413> Abel,<WH1893> his brother,<WH251> "Let<WH7704>'s go into the field." It happened when they were in the field, that Cain<WH7014> rose up<WH6965> against<WH413> Abel,<WH1893> his brother,<WH251> and killed him.<WH2026>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Cain,<WH7014> "Where<WH335> is Abel,<WH1893> your brother?<WH251>" He said,<WH559> "I don't<WH3045> know. Am I my brother<WH251>'s keeper?"
Yahweh said,<WH559> "What<WH4100> have you done?<WH6213> The voice<WH6963> of your brother<WH251>'s blood<WH1818> cries<WH6817> to me from the ground.<WH127>
Now you are cursed<WH779> because of the ground,<WH127> which has opened<WH6475> its mouth<WH6310> to receive<WH3947> your brother<WH251>'s blood<WH1818> from your hand.<WH3027>
From now on,<WH3588> when you till<WH5647> the ground,<WH127> it won't<WH3254> yield<WH5414> its strength<WH3581> to you.<WH5128> You shall be a fugitive and a wanderer<WH5110> in the earth.<WH776>"
Cain<WH7014> said<WH559> to Yahweh,<WH3068> "My punishment<WH5771> is greater<WH1419> than I can bear.<WH5375>

Behold,<WH1644> you have driven me out this day<WH3117> from the surface<WH6440> of the ground.<WH5641> I will be hidden from<WH5921> your face,<WH6440> and I will be a fugitive<WH5128> and a wanderer<WH5110> in the earth.<WH776> It will happen<WH1961> that whoever finds me<WH4672> will kill me.<WH2026>"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to him,<WH3651> "Therefore whoever slays<WH2026> Cain,<WH7014> vengeance will be taken<WH5358> on him sevenfold.<WH7659>" Yahweh<WH3068> appointed<WH7760> a sign<WH226> for Cain,<WH7014> lest<WH1115> any finding<WH4672> him should strike him.<WH5221>
Cain<WH7014> went out<WH3318> from Yahweh<WH3068>'s presence,<WH6440> and lived<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Nod,<WH5113> east<WH6926> of Eden.<WH5731>

Cain<WH7014> knew<WH3045> his wife.<WH802> She conceived,<WH2029> and gave birth<WH3205> to Enoch.<WH2585> He built<WH1129> a city,<WH5892> and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the city,<WH5892> after the name<WH8034> of his son,<WH1121> Enoch.<WH2585>

To Enoch<WH2585> was born<WH3205> Irad.<WH5897> Irad<WH5897> became<WH3205> the father of Mehujael.<WH4232> Mehujael<WH4232> became<WH3205> the father of Methushael.<WH4967> Methushael<WH4967> became<WH3205> the father of Lamech.<WH3929>
Lamech<WH3929> took<WH3947> two<WH8147> wives:<WH802> the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Adah,<WH5711> and the name<WH8034> of the other<WH8145> Zillah.<WH6741>
Adah<WH5711> gave birth<WH3205> to Jabal,<WH2989> who was the father<WH1> of those who dwell<WH3427> in tents<WH168> and have livestock.<WH4735>
His brother<WH251>'s name<WH8034> was Jubal,<WH3106> who was the father<WH1> of all who handle<WH8610> the harp<WH3658> and pipe.<WH5748>

Zillah<WH6741> also gave birth<WH3205> to Tubal<WH8423> Cain,<WH3913> the forger of every cutting instrument<WH2794> of brass<WH5178> and iron.<WH1270> Tubal<WH8423> Cain<WH269>'s sister was Naamah.<WH5279>

Lamech<WH3929> said<WH559> to his wives,<WH802> "Adah<WH5711> and Zillah,<WH6741> hear<WH8085> my voice.<WH6963> You wives<WH802> of Lamech,<WH3929> listen<WH238> to my speech,<WH565> for I have slain<WH2026> a man<WH3206> for wounding<WH6482> me,<WH3206> a young man for bruising me.<WH2250>
If<WH3588> Cain<WH7014> will be avenged<WH5358> seven<WH7659> times,<WH3929> truly Lamech seventy-seven<WH7657> times.<WH7651>"

Adam<WH120> knew<WH3045> his wife<WH802> again.<WH5750> She gave birth<WH3205> to a son,<WH1121> and<WH7121> named<WH8034> him Seth,<WH8352> "for God<WH430> has appointed<WH7896> me another<WH312> child<WH2233> instead<WH8478> of Abel,<WH1893> for Cain<WH7014> killed him.<WH2026>"
There was also born<WH3205> a son<WH1121> to Seth,<WH8352> and he named<WH8034> him Enosh.<WH583> Then men<WH2490> began to call<WH7121> on Yahweh<WH3068>'s name.<WH8034>
